actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that the interest rates applicable for purposes of sections 482 and 483 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 shall not exceed the interest rates applicable for such purposes on August 1, 1980.

summary.text: Freezes, as of August 1, 1980, interest rates applicable to provisions of the Internal Revenue Code governing Internal Revenue Service authority to allocate income and deductions among taxpayers and the imputation of interest on certain deferred payments.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the interest rates applicable for purposes of sections 482 and 483 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 shall not exceed the interest rates applicable for such purposes on August 1, 1980.
